Phobias eyes widened, at the propisition, "working for this Magmatron? How
could I benefit from this offer?" he thought with the curiosity of his
function.
Phobias reply scared even him as he looked Magmatron square in the optics
and replied,
"Why should I help you, I scanned dozens of trans-life signatures. surely
there are other predicons to whom I could side with, Why should I join an
army of three predicons? If thats what you call yourselves!
(Of the record question do destrucons have a seperate symbol, or do they
still wear predicon symbols?)

> ::Magmatron::
>
>     "I see you are a bargainer." Magmatron said to Phobia. "Simply wish
you
